title: Complete List of DSA for Infectious Agents and HIV Diagnostic Assays
author: Center; Research
description: Links to the different types of Donor Screening Assays. A table for each assay is provided with detailed information such as tradename, infectious agent, format, specimen, use, manufacturer, approval date, and STN.
cleaned_text: Complete List of Donor Screening Assays for Infectious Agents and HIV Diagnostic Assays Assays (detect Hepatitis B Surface Antigen)) [Anti-HBc Assays - Hepatitis B Virus Core Antigen](#Anti-HBc Assays (detect antibodies to Hepatitis B Virus Core Antigen)) [HBV Nucleic Acid Assays - Hepatitis B Virus](#HBV Nucleic Assays - Hepatitis C Virus Encoded Antigen](#Anti-HCV Assays (detect antibodies to Hepatitis C Virus Encoded Antigen)) [HCV Nucleic Acid Assays - Hepatitis C Virus](#HCV Nucleic Acid Assays (detect Hepatitis C Virus RNA), see also Multiplex Assays) HIV [Anti-HIV-1 Assays - Human Immunodeficiency Virus Type 1](#Anti-HIV-1 Assays (detect antibodies to Human Immunodeficiency Virus type 1)) [HIV-1 Nucleic Acid Assays - Human Virus Type 1](#HIV-1 Nucleic Acid Assays (detect Human Immunodeficiency also Multiplex Assays) [HIV-Syphilis Assay](#HIV-Syphilis Assay) [Anti-HIV Specimen Collection Devices, Testing Services, and Home Test Kits](#Anti-HIV Specimen Collection Devices, Testing Services, and Home Test Kits) [Anti-HIV-2 Assays - Human Immunodeficiency Virus Type 2](#Anti-HIV-2 Assays(detect antibodies to Human Immunodeficiency Virus type 2)) [Anti-HIV-1/2 Assays - Human Immunodeficiency Virus Types 1 and 2](#Anti-HIV-1/2 Assays (detect antibodies to Human Immunodeficiency Virus types 1 and 2)) [Anti-HIV-1/2 and HIV-1 Antigen Combo Assays](#Anti-HIV-1/2 and HIV-1 Antigen Combo Assays (detect HIV-1 antigen and antibodies to HIV Types 1 and 2)) HTLV [Anti-HTLV-I/II Assays - Human T-Lymphotropic Virus Types I and II](#Anti-HTLV-I/II Assays (detect antibodies to Human T-Lymphotropic Virus types I Virus RNA)) antibody neutralization Confirmatory: To confirm the presence of HBsAg in samples found to be repeatedly reactive by the ABBOTT Alinity s HBsAg License s HIV Ag/Ab Combo](/vaccines-blood-biologics/approved-blood-products/alinity-s-hiv-agab-combo-assay) Abbott GbmH Wiesbaden, Germany US License 2095 [ABBOTT Alinity s Anti-HCV](/vaccines-blood-biologics/blood-blood-products/alinity-s-anti-hcv) Wiesbaden, Alinity s Anti-HBc](/vaccines-blood-biologics/alinity-s-anti-hbc) Abbott GbmH & Co Germany US License 2095 [ABBOTT Alinity s Chagas](/vaccines-blood-biologics/alinity-s-chagas) Wiesbaden, Germany US License 2095 [Alinity s Anti-HCV II assay](/vaccines-blood-biologics/alinity-s-anti-hcv-ii-assay) To screen individual human donors, including volunteer donors of whole blood and blood components, and other living donors for the presence of anti-HCV. OraSure HIV-1 is intended for use with subjects 13 years of age or older.
